resources.string: this demo show the base behaviour of DataBinding framework
this demo show how to bind a simple Adapter to ListView by DataBinding framework
this demo show how to bind a simple Adapter to RecyclerView by DataBinding framework
this demo show how to listen text change and focus listener
this demo show how to use bind adpter with multi items in listView
this demo show how to bind round image
this demo show how to bind double list view
this demo show how to use select mode with SelectHelper
this demo show how to bind self event
this demo show how to bind self attribute
